 Some hints
 Long tap any menu item to get an explanation of what it does.
 You can tap on:
 ･ the loudspeaker icon to toggle the TTGO beep
 ･ the battery icon to get precise charge level indication
 ･ the landing zone (orange circle) to get google maps directions to the predicted landing site
 ･ the explosion icon to get the time of the (predicted or actual) burst local time
